properties.address: Thorpe Acre Road, Loughborough, Leicestershire LE11 4LF
properties.description: Warm and welcoming church hall. There is space for children to play and some games are provided. Refreshments are serviced from 10.00am and at 12 noon a simple lunch is served at a cost of just £1.50. This is hot soup and a roll in winter.
properties.title: All Saints Thorpe Acre Church Hall

properties.address: Beveridge Street, Barrow upon Soar, Loughborough, Leicestershire LE12 8PL
properties.description: Tuesday Connect Cafe and afternoon service; Thursday The Harbour - a safe and warm space open to all and includes the food bank; Friday Sports and Crafts - a group for seniors; Sunday morning church service - all welcome
properties.title: Barrow Baptist Church

properties.description: CAN HQ is our hub as an organisation, featuring 3 floors with the ground floor being a community space with rooms for workshops, exhibitions, a shop, and more. On the ground floor, 'Peter's Place' is our public living room, a space where anyone is welcome to pop in, find out more about what's happening in the local area, and have a chat and free cup of tea or coffee.
properties.title: CAN HQ

properties.description: We provide a warm safe space. We offer hot drinks, biscuits/cake, and a lunch.
properties.title: Christchurch Methodist Church

properties.description: Nottingham City Libraries are open to all who live, work or study in the city, providing spaces to meet, read, study, relax, learn and explore. Our libraries host a range of regular activities for all ages where people can meet others in their community while learning a skill or chatting about shared interests from knitting to gaming and of course reading.
properties.title: Clifton Library

properties.description: Micro pub on the High Street, offering a safe space to all for a free Hot Drink, Biscuits and Conversation.
properties.title: Dave Noseley

properties.description: Open to all. Accessible to pushchairs, wheelchairs and small scooters. Runs on Fridays 10.30-15.00 from 15th November until Easter. Free hot or cold drinks, biscuits and also sandwiches at lunchtime. Games, toys, books and magazines available or just sit and chat. Feel free to bring your own craftwork or knitting. Quiet room for reading. Free internet. On "The Keyworth" bus route. Community bus transport available on request.
properties.title: Friday Warm Welcome Space

properties.description: Infusion is open as a warm space every Tuesday to Friday from 10:30am until 3pm. Free Wi-Fi, Device Charging, People to chat to, stay as long as you want during opening, Pay it forward/suspended coffee scheme, space to work, Food/Drink for sale
properties.title: Infusion Coffee House & Community Space

properties.address: Parochial Hall, Selby Lane, Keyworth, Nottingham NG12 5AH
properties.description: Open from November 15th
properties.title: Keyworth Friday Warm Welcome Space

properties.description: Main Church building open 10 - 1.00pm Tea, coffee, chat and table tennis
properties.title: Mountsorrel Baptist Church

properties.description: Mountsorrel Library is a welcoming warm space for everyone, whatever the weather. It's not always easy to find a place to spend some time without also having to spend money. Libraries in Leicestershire are always free to access. Here at Mountsorrel, as well as all our lovely books we have weekly clubs and activities, comfortable chairs, a lovely children's area, free computers and wifi and even jigsaws. Our volunteers will welcome you whenever we're open and, if you do want to treat yourself a bit, we offer a range of hot drinks for £1 each. Our hot chocolate is especially popular! We are fully wheelchair accessible.
properties.title: Mountsorrel Library

properties.description: A warm welcome and an invitation to sit and connect near the Clock Tower on Memorial Square. Come into our shop and Peter's Place is to your left behind the willow wall - say hello to the person at the welcome desk, look around the Gallery, ask about our activities and share what you care about - or sit quietly in your own space
properties.title: Peters Place at Coalville CAN

properties.address: The Petersham Hall, Nottingham, Derbyshire NG10 4DS
properties.description: A community breakfast cafe offering free breakfasts, drinks and a welcoming environment.
properties.title: Petersham Community Breakfast cafe

properties.description: We are a friendly, community-based library ran by volunteers. Hot and cold drinks are available, along with books, newspapers and magazines. Public computers are also available.
properties.title: Rothley Community Library

properties.address: St Marys Church Wilsthorpe Rd, Sawley, Notts NG10 3JW
properties.description: Open all year except Good Friday All ages welcome .Toddler toys available Puzzle books, dominoes, jigsaws etc for all ages or a quiet area to sit socially distance if preferred Free tea, coffee, hot chocolate, toast, crumpets, biscuits and porridge. Dietary requirements catered for. Newspapers, puzzles, table games, children's toys, quiet area
properties.title: Sawley St Marys Church
